item.title: South African rapist loses bid to block Netflix film about his life
item.description: Thabo Bester had argued the documentary would affect his trial for allegedly faking his death to escape prison.

item.title: Suspect in custody and named as Tyler Robinson - what we know so far
item.description: President Trump says "I think we've got him".

item.title: UK says 'great news' British national freed in Belarus release deal
item.description: Julia Fenner was given a long jail term after being detained while entering Belarus in March 2024.

item.title: US joins UN Security Council condemnation of Israeli strikes on Qatar
item.description: The US traditionally blocks actions against its close ally Israel at the United Nations.

item.title: Japan sets record of nearly 100,000 people aged over 100
item.description: The number of Japanese centenarians rose to 99,763 in September, with women making up 88% of the total.
